description_carte: Leo, a king dethroned, now stalks the shadows. His roar brings despair, his claws rend souls.
description_visuelle: A lion wreathed in shadows, with glowing red eyes and a mane of pure darkness. Spectral claws extend from its paws.

skills.name: Shadow Claw
skills.description: Leo strikes with claws of pure darkness, dealing significant damage.

skills.name: Despair Roar
skills.description: Leo lets out a deafening roar that weaken all enemies reducing their damage.

skills.name: Night Stalker
skills.description: Leo enters the shadows, becoming invisible for a short time.

skills.name: Soul Rend
skills.description: Leo's claws tear at the soul, dealing damage and weakening the target's defenses.

skills.name: Shadowmane Aura
skills.description: Leo passively gains increased attack damage.
